dialog-bob1.name: Bob
messages: Name's Bob.
Stone Cold Bob Austin.
Right, what's yours, then?

dialog-bob1.name: Black Mage
messages:
You don't know who I am?
We've both lived here for years!

dialog-bob1.name: Bob
messages:
Don't know nobody. All I know is,
gotta keep everyone out.
You know, unless their name is Bob.

dialog-bob1.name: Black Mage
messages: Bob?

dialog-bob1.name: Bob
messages:
Bob. Camel case.
Nice and plain.
Traditional.

'Cause this club is Bobs-only.
You know, the Bobs-Only Club.

dialog-bob1.name: Black Mage
messages: Why is it Bobs only?

dialog-bob1.name: Bob
messages:
Why?
Why is it Bobs only?

Why, it wouldn't be the Bobs-Only Club
if I just let anyone in!

dialog-bob2.name: Bob
messages: So, what's your name then?

dialog-bob3.name: Black Mage
messages: Um.... it's not Bob.

dialog-bob3.name: Bob
messages:
Sorry, can't unlock the door for ya.
Bobs only.

dialog-bob4.name: Black Mage
messages:
Why, what luck!
My name happens to be Bob!

dialog-bob4.name: Bob
messages:
Nice. Great name.
I'll unlock the door.

dialog-bob5.name: Bob
messages: There you go. It's open.

dialog-bob6.name: Black Mage
messages:
Hey, what gives?
I still can't get in.

dialog-bob7.name: Bob
messages: Oh, it's unlocked.

dialog-bob7.name: Black Mage
messages: Then why won't it open?

dialog-bob7.name: Bob
messages: Oh. The door's not implemented yet.

dialog-bob7.name: Black Mage
messages: You could've said that from the start!

dialog-bob7.name: Bob
messages:
Not my job. My only job is to
keep everyone out who's
not named Bob.

dialog-bob8.name: Bob
messages: So, what's your name, then?

dialog-bob8.name: Black Mage
messages:
The door doesn't work!
What does it matter what
my name is?

dialog-bob8.name: Bob
messages:
Not my job.
My only job is to keep everyone out
who's not named Bob.

dialog-max1.name: Max Swagger
messages: Ah, a citizen!
I wondered if you could help me!

dialog-max1.name: Black Mage
messages: What do you need?

dialog-max1.name: Max Swagger
messages:
My name's Swagger!
Max Swagger!

I was doing a bit of reconnoissance,
looking for a place where I can
open my new fashion shop.

The board here says there's space
available, but I can't seem to find
the building it's talking about.

The only thing actually here is
the Bobs-Only Club!

dialog-max1.name: Black Mage
messages:
Well, the town isn't fully implemented
yet, so... you might have to wait
a few more weeks for the rest of
the buildings to return.

dialog-max2.name: Max Swagger
messages: Not fully implemented?

dialog-max2.name: Black Mage
messages: Sorry.

But I can personally guarantee
you can have a building all to yourself
when the time comes.

dialog-max2.name: Max Swagger
messages: Oh! That's good news! All to myself?
I'm picturing two stories... no, three!

Lush woven carpets... vaulted ceilings...
beautiful oak doors...
hand-carved decorative moulding....

dialog-max2.name: Black Mage
messages:
Um, well....
You'll definitely get a building.

dialog-max2.name: Max Swagger
messages:
Excellent! Then I shall return
when the time comes!
Until that glorious day, farewell!

dialog-max3.name: Black Mage
messages:
Not much of a market for fashion here,
I would've thought.
Best of luck, Max Swagger!

dialog-timmy.name: Timmy
messages: I'm practicing for my triathlon!

Running is my weakest event, so I'm
working hard to improve my time!

dialog-timmy.name: Black Mage
messages: Don't you need legs to run?

dialog-timmy.name: Timmy
messages: No?

dialog-kid.name: Sports Kid
messages: I'm gonna be a Blitzball when I grow up!

dialog-goose.name: Goose
messages: Honk!

dialog-beatrice1.name: Beatrice
messages:
Back when he was a young man,
my husband Delmar hand-carved
all the statues on the fountains
around town.

Such a shame that this one isn't working.
I wonder if something is clogging
the pump.

dialog-beatrice2.name: Beatrice
messages:
Between you and me....
I think the goose has something
to do with it.

dialog-trekkie_demo.name: Trekkie
messages: Me heard you will soon have a birthday!

dialog-trekkie_demo.name: Black Mage
messages:
That's right! I'll be turning 16,
and I'll get to be an official
village mage!

dialog-trekkie_demo.name: Trekkie
messages: Me hope you have happy birthday!

dialog-trekkie_demo.name: Black Mage
messages: Thanks very much, Trekkie!

dialog-verthandi.name: Verthandi
messages:
I'm so glad the goats made up
and are friends again!

dialog-goat.name: Goat
messages: Baaahhh!

dialog-cleo2.name: Cat
messages: Meowwowow.

dialog-cleo2.name: Cleo
messages:
That's what I've been saying
this whole time!

dialog-cleo2.name: Cat
messages: Meowwrrrr!

dialog-cleo2.name: Cleo
messages: Oh, I know!

dialog-cleo1.name: Cat
messages: Meowrrow.

dialog-cleo1.name: Cleo
messages: Oh, you don't say!

dialog-cleo1.name: Cat
messages: Meow!

dialog-cleo1.name: Cleo
messages: He didn't!

dialog-cat.name: Black Mage
messages: Hey there, cat!

dialog-cat.name: Cleo
messages:
Excuse me, but we were in the middle
of a conversation.

dialog-cat.name: Black Mage
messages: Oh, sorry. Carry on.

dialog-smith.name: Mr. Smith
messages:
I came here on a blacksmithing
scholarship, but there's not much
blacksmithing to do at the moment.

I think I'll stick around anyway.
See what happens.
